WorkItem.Description:
This has happened both last night and tonight.
 
Open application, reset all caches, load character from armory.
Window just stays open with no errors at 0 of 2 tasks complete. (Can't cancel this window, but I'm sure that's a well-known bug.)
 
If I load a character, it tries and fails to retrieve the item cache from the armory as far as I can tell, every item in every display just says "Downloading from Armory".
 
I have also tried having Silverlight delete the application data, same results exactly.
 
Mac OS 10.6.2
Silverlight 3.0.40818.0

Comments.Message: I should mention that both nights I checked wowarmory.com and eu.wowarmory.com and they were both loading fine in a browser.
Correct, all armory access is down right now.
Is it possible to use the item cache file from 2.3.5 in Rawr3? If so, where does that file need to be in OS X?
